findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may be excessive for certain types of information, potentially leading to challenges in compliance and enforceability.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing the Disclosing Party to seek injunctive relief without posting bond may expose the Receiving Party to significant risk if a breach occurs.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Limiting assignment of the agreement may restrict business flexibility and complicate potential future transactions or restructuring.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
